mapper.select: SELECT expert.id id,/*专家id*/ expert.nick_name nickName,/*专家昵称*/ expert.img img,/*专家头像*/ expert.lable lable,/*专家标签*/ IFNULL(expert.fans,0) + IFNULL(expert.start_fans,0) fans,/*粉丝*/ plan.plan_popularity popularity,/*人气*/ victory.lz_now lz,/*当前连中*/ victory.z_three_days zThreeDays,/*三天命中*/ victory.z_five_days zFiveDays,/*五天命中*/ victory.z_seven_days zSevenDays,/*七天命中*/ victory.return_seven_days returnSevenDays, plan.title titleShowType,/*方案标题*/ plan.plan_Hit planHit, plan.price price,/*方案价格*/ plan.create_time createTime,/*方案创建时间*/ pd.create_time buyTime,/*购买时间*/ expert.grade level,/*专家等级*/ plan.id planId, plan.status status, pd.third_money thirdMoney,/*支付金额*/ pd.buy_money buyMoney , pd.first firstone, victory.ten_z tenZ, victory.nine_z nineZ, victory.eight_z eightZ, victory.seven_z sevenZ, victory.six_z sixZ, victory.five_z fiveZ, victory.four_z fourZ, victory.three_z threeZ, victory.lz_big lzBig, case when pd.pay_type = '0' then '余额支付' when pd.pay_type = '20' then '微信支付' when pd.pay_type = '21' then '支付宝支付' when pd.pay_type = '22' then '微信支付' when pd.pay_type = '99' then '点播卡支付' end AS paytype, pd.order_id orderId from tb_jc_purchase_detailed pd LEFT JOIN tb_jc_expert expert ON pd.expert_id = expert.id LEFT JOIN tb_jc_victory victory ON pd.expert_id = victory.expert_id LEFT JOIN tb_jc_plan plan ON pd.scheme_id = plan.id LEFT JOIN tb_jc_match match1 ON pd.scheme_id = match1.plan_id where pd.user_id = #{userId} and pd.pay_status in ('2','1','3') GROUP BY pd.scheme_id order by pd.create_time desc

SELECT * from tb_jc_purchase_detailed pd
where pd.order_id = #{orderId}
SELECT * from tb_jc_purchase_detailed pd where pd.pay_status = 0 and pd.pay_type in('20','21','22') AND CREATE_TIME BETWEEN DATE_SUB(now(), INTERVAL 20 MINUTE) AND now()
SELECT * from tb_jc_purchase_detailed pd where pd.pay_status = 0 and pd.pay_type in('20','21','22') AND CREATE_TIME BETWEEN DATE_SUB(now(), INTERVAL 6 HOUR) AND DATE_SUB(now(), INTERVAL 20 MINUTE)

SELECT * from tb_jc_purchase_detailed pd
where pd.user_id = #{userId} and pd.scheme_id = #{schemeId} and pd.pay_status in('2','1','3')

SELECT * from tb_jc_purchase_detailed pd
where pd.user_id = #{userId} and pd.order_id = #{orderId}

SELECT count(*) from tb_jc_purchase_detailed pd
where pd.user_id = #{userId} and pd.pay_status in('1','2','3')

SELECT * from tb_jc_purchase_detailed pd
where pd.scheme_id = #{schemeId} and pd.pay_status = '1'

SELECT count(*) from tb_jc_purchase_detailed pd
where pd.user_id = #{userId} and pd.pay_status in ('2','1','3')
